job.title: Marketing Data Consultant, Senior - Healthcare
job.description: Do you enjoy using your analytical skills to be the one-and-only Data Scientist on the Marketing Team? Do you enjoy collaborating and building relationships with key partners to help support the organizationâs data goals for health plan products that are highly compliance and government regulated? As a Marketing & Communications Consultant, Senior you will manage the data and analytical marketing projects for the WellFirst Health Plan - provided by SSM Health Plan in MO and IL along with providing additional support for initiatives with Dean Health Plan and Prevea360 Health Plan in WI for the Medicare & ACA Health Insurance Plans.What Youâll Do: Primary Focus AreasUse analytics methods to extract value from business data Work with statistical models to support segmentation and personalization Share results with both technical and non-technical audiences Hands-on experience using large datasets to draw business insights Data Work: analysis, proofing, appending, sftp pickup/deliveryExcel work (macros, splitting, formulas, vlookups)Targeting, segmentation, and personalization of dataData Visualization: Charts, Visio, Presentations, Etc.IDN (Integrated Delivery Network) Marketing Projects: Coordinate data with hospitals and clinics, clinic/hospitals visits (refill brochure inventory) and occasionally onsite events at Care locationsSurveys + Analysis/ReportingMarket Research; Marketing/Advertising Strategic Analysis; Market/Geographic Strategic AnalysisSpread best practices of analytics to stakeholders and across the marketing teamManage marketing projects: copywriting and project management in WorkfrontCandidates give best consideration will have the following:Understanding of how analytics and data impact marketing and advertisingStrong analytical skillsHighly proficient in Microsoft ExcelSelf-starterExcellent written and verbal communication skillsThis position is based in the WellFirst Health St. Louis, MO office with 1-2 days a week an option for remote work.Read more at https://ssmh.wd5.myworkdayjobs.com/ssmhealth/job/MO-SSM-Health-Westview-Building/Marketing---Communications-Consultant--Senior--St-Louis-_R34097
